mapper.select: SELECT NG_PIC AS ngPic, GR_NAME AS grName, MEM_NAME AS memName, CATE1 AS grCate1Name, CATE2 AS grCate2Name FROM HOT_GROUP_VIEW
SELECT NG_PIC AS ngPic, GR_NAME AS grName, MEM_NAME AS memName, CATE1 AS grCate1Name, CATE2 AS grCate2Name FROM NEWEST_VIEW
SELECT MEM_PIC AS memPic, MEM_NAME AS memName, MEM_INTRO AS memIntro FROM HOT_HOST_VIEW
SELECT NG_PIC AS ngPic, GR_NAME AS grName, MEM_NAME AS memName, CATE1 AS grCate1Name, CATE2 AS grCate2Name FROM CLOSING_VIEW

SELECT E.ngPic AS ngPic,E.grName AS grName,E.memName AS memName,E.grCate1Name AS grCate1Name,E.grCate2Name AS grCate2Name FROM ( SELECT NG.NG_PIC AS ngPic,G.GR_NAME AS grName,M.MEM_NAME AS memName,C1.CATE_NAME AS grCate1Name,C2.CATE_NAME AS grCate2Name FROM MEMBER M JOIN TBL_GROUP G ON M.CATE_CODE1=G.CATE_CODE1 OR M.CATE_CODE1=G.CATE_CODE2 OR M.CATE_CODE2=G.CATE_CODE1 OR M.CATE_CODE2=G.CATE_CODE2 JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON C1.CATE_CODE=G.CATE_CODE1 JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON C2.CATE_CODE=G.CATE_CODE2 JOIN NOW_GROUP NG ON NG.GR_CODE = G.GR_CODE WHERE M.MEM_ID=#{memId} )E WHERE 3>=ROWNUM
